title: Self-build - Oveco
description: Learn by doing, build with guidance. Oveco trains and guides you in your energy self-build projects.

sections.subtitle: Self-build
sections.title: Build your energy autonomy
sections.description: We believe that self-build is a powerful way to take ownership of your habitat. By training you, advising you, and providing the right tools, we enable you to actively participate in installations safely.

services.title: Custom support
services.description: Each project is unique: we adapt our advice, training, and tools to your skills and goals.

services.title: Training and transmission
services.description: Training sessions are scheduled before key stages of the construction. You become autonomous while being supported.

services.title: Accessible professional equipment
services.description: We offer professional equipment at preferential prices, with delivery and technical support.

sections.title: Initial training
sections.description: Before starting, we train you in the basics of energy installation: safety, tools, techniques. You learn essential skills in a controlled environment.

sections.title: On-site support
sections.description: An Oveco engineer is present at key stages of your project. They guide you, validate your installations, and ensure everything complies with standards.

sections.title: Commissioning
sections.description: Once the work is complete, we proceed with the full commissioning of your installation. You leave with all the knowledge to manage your system autonomously.
